segments.text: I'm now on the Songshan airport getting ready for departure . I realized that I might have left my watch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Ma'am . May I have your name and room number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My name is Terry . I stayed last night in your hotel in room 132 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of watch is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a brand-new Seiko wrist watch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm glad to hear that . Would you kindly send it to the Hilton Hotel ?
segments.speaker: S1
